Description:
Family Oasis
Promising superb family living, this four bedroom, two bathroom home is stylishly presented on a substantial block of land measuring approximately 612m2. The open living area is the social heart of the home, extensive lounge and dining spaces enhanced by oversized windows and a modern fireplace amid bespoke cabinetry. An elegant kitchen boasts granite bench tops and a full complement of modern appliances. The adjoining alfresco deck is covered for year round use, surrounded by tropical plants which heighten the entertaining experience. The elevated aspect overlooks a large backyard to tempt a swimming pool. Four large bedrooms are fitted with mirrored built-in wardrobes and share two bathrooms with Velux windows, one with shower over a corner spa bath plus a separate (third) shower room. Additional features to complete a fabulous family home include laundry facilities, ducted heating, evaporative air conditioning, security alarm and ample off street parking including a wide double carport. Close to Keilor Road retail precinct, Bradshaw Reserve, St Bernard’s and Buckley Park Colleges, families are placed for lifestyle convenience.

- Close to Buckley Park and St Bernard’s Colleges, Keilor Road shops and Bradshaw Reserve
